# DetectHumanBodyPose3DRequest

**Class**

A request that detects points on human bodies in 3D space, relative to the camera.

## Declaration

```swift
final class DetectHumanBodyPose3DRequest
```

## Overview

This request generates a collection of [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/HumanBodyPose3DObservation] objects that describe the position of each body the request detects. If the system allows it, the request uses [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVDepthData] information to improve the accuracy.

## Creating a request

- **init(_:frameAnalysisSpacing:)**: Creates a 3D human body pose request.

## Getting the revision

- **revision**: The algorithm or implementation the request uses.
- **supportedRevisions**: The collection of revisions the request supports.
- **DetectHumanBodyPose3DRequest.Revision**: A type that describes the algorithm or implementation that the request performs.

## Inspecting a request

- **supportedJointNames**: The joint names the request supports.
- **supportedJointsGroupNames**: The joint group names the request supports.

## Performing a request

- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on an image URL and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on image data and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Graphics image and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a pixel buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Media buffer and produces observations.
- **perform(on:orientation:)**: Performs the request on a Core Image image and produces observations.
- **HumanBodyPose3DObservation**: An observation that provides the 3D body points the request recognizes.

## 3D body pose detection

- **Joint3D**: An object that represents a body pose joint in 3D space.

## Conforms To

- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- ImageProcessingRequest
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- StatefulRequest
- VisionRequest
